column4: Ya, maybe some day I will try dual booting Windows XP and Ubuntu. I am afraid to because if I want to reverse something it might be bad. Always backup things onto another hard drive
I don't have Windows on a disk
I have Windows XP on a computer but it only came with restore disks
ive done it plenty of times no danger at all
and onece you try ubuntu if you havent already i dont think you will go back
ive never had isues there are proper ways to uninstall ubuntu from a dual boot
